title: Umbraco Mock Helper for Unit Testing
description: A helper class for creating mocked Umbraco objects for unit testing. Includes methods for mocking IPublishedContent, IPublishedElement, BlockList/BlockGrid items, MediaWithCrops, UmbracoHelper, and URL providers using Moq.

title: Umbraco Controller Testing Base Class
description: Base class for testing Umbraco-based controllers with ASP.NET Core. Provides a method to create mocked IFeatureCollection with UmbracoRouteValues, allowing access to CurrentPage in controller tests. Includes proper setup for HTTP request/response features.
